cast.overview: In this biographical drama, Selena Quintanilla is born into a musical Mexican-American family in Texas. Her father, Abraham, realizes that his young daughter is talented and begins performing with her at small venues. She finds success and falls for her guitarist, Chris Perez, who draws the ire of her father. Seeking mainstream stardom, Selena begins recording an English-language album which, tragically, she would never complete.
cast.title: Selena

details.biography: Suzette Michelle Arriaga (born. Suzette Michelle Quintanilla) is a Mexican-American drummer. She is the sister of Selena, the "Queen of Tejano Music," and A.B. Quintanilla III. Arriaga was the drummer for the band Selena y Los Dinos.
details.name: Suzette Arriaga
